_header: A sovereign praising of Gods might that is endless
_description: A verse tag in a collection of sermons by John Waldeby — one quatrain

BodLauMis77.Transcription:
A souerene praysinge of goddes mythe þat is endlesseA grete
                    disyringe of nobul fadurhed & forgyfnesseA opun schewynge of owre synne
                    & of owr wykkudnesseto þe reine rynyng to þe sunne shinynge
                    & to a mesur in mecynge
